content:
# I have successfully extracted another unit of stone brick, bringing my total to 3 stone bricks in the inventory. 
# The furnace is currently showing a warning: "no ingredients to smelt," indicating that it has no stones left to process.

# I still have 5 units of stone in my inventory, so I will insert these into the furnace to keep it operational.

insert_item(Prototype.Stone, furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert all 5 units of stone into the furnace
print(f"Inserted stone for further smelting. Current inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after inserting stone again.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the entities again.
